roleset.name: have a drippy nose
roleset.note: SNIVEL-V NOTES: related to sniffle? Member of VNcls nonverbal_expression-40.2, manner_speaking-37.3. Updated by Julia, 11/2010. (from snivel.01-v)

example.name: adjectival
example.text: Her sister-in-law (Amy Wright) is a sniveling prude afraid that Kate will seduce all the married men in town...

example.name: with utterance
example.text: ["I'm having a bad dream,"]-1 he sniveled *trace*-1 .

example.name: with cause
example.text: Even when his toothbrush needed to be replaced, he sniveled at the thought of having to throw it out because it was special.
example.arg: Even when his toothbrush needed to be replaced
at the thought of having to throw it out
